mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.sum, t.from_account_id, t.to_account_id, t.date FROM transfer t LEFT JOIN account fa ON fa.id = t.from_account_id LEFT JOIN account ta ON ta.id = t.to_account_id WHERE t.date <= #{beforeDate} AND t.date >= #{afterDate} AND (fa.user_id = #{userId} OR ta.user_id = #{userId})
SELECT t.id, t.sum, t.from_account_id, t.to_account_id, t.date FROM transfer t WHERE t.id=#{transferId}
